messages.content: In the market for a new telescope. 🔭 Any recommendations?
Happy Halloween! 🎃 Dressed up as Blackbeard this year. 🏴‍☠️ Love ya, bro!
On our way to the Bahamas for some fun in the sun. 🍹 #rumweekend
Mounted a new mermaid figurehead to the front of the ship. 🧜‍♀️ Looks dooooopppeeee!
My glass eye fell out at the party last night. If you find it, let me know! 👀
We're hiring: come work with me! Need a few ship hands for our next voyage. No experience neccessary. Will train on the job.
Yo ho, yo ho, a pirates life for me!
